The contents of this folder are from the Matlab File Exchange
	https://www.mathworks.com/matlabcentral/fileexchange/47561-cmd
Downloaded 2020/06/07 12:41

The license that was mentioned inside the code's comments was not
present on the file exchange. However, that page provided a link to
the project's GitHub page ( https://github.com/suever/cmd ), so I
copied in the LICENSE.txt file separately from there.
LICENSE.txt downloaded 2020/06/07 12:57

This content allows calling command line (e.g. system(), !) code
while also being able to specify timeouts, i.e. place a cap on total
runtime of that commandline call.
